title: Calories in Matcha Latte
meta_description: Learn calories in matcha latte for a standard 8 oz serving, plus protein, carbs, fat, full nutrition facts, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 8 oz (240 ml) serving with 1 tsp matcha powder whisked into steamed whole milk; no added sugar or syrup.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by milk type, matcha quality, portion size, and added sweeteners; check recipes or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard matcha latte provides ~150 kcal and ~8 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use skim milk instead of whole milk

faqs.q: How many calories in a matcha latte with whole milk?
faqs.a: About 150 kcal for an 8 oz standard serving.

faqs.q: What's the protein in matcha latte?
faqs.a: Roughly 8 g from the milk, with minimal from matcha.
Natural sugars from milk (~12 g); added sweeteners increase it.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in matcha latte?
faqs.a: Opt for skim or plant-based milk and skip syrups or honey.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in matcha latte?
faqs.a: Yes, about 12 g mainly from milk lactose; matcha adds negligible carbs.
